Name: Navigate Home and Verify Product Favorites in Tool Shop
Description: Navigate to the home page, select a product category, view product details, and verify the home page after interacting with favorites.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on input selectCategory
Step 3: Click on link viewProduct (viewProductSledgehammer) -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 4: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductClawHammer)
Step 5: Click on link navigateHome -> Navigate to page '/'
Step 6: Click on link pageNavigation
Step 7: Click on link viewProduct (viewProductOpenEndSpanners) -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 8: Click on button cartFavoritesAction (addToCart) -> Navigate to page ''
Step 9: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Explore Hand Tools and Verify Favorites in Tool Shop
Description: Navigate to the home page, explore hand tools, view multiple product details, and verify the home page after adding favorites.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link navigateCategories
Step 3: Click on link navigateHandTools -> Navigate to page 'hand tools category#*/*'
Step 4: Click on link viewProductThorHammer -> Navigate to page 'product#product/*'
Step 5: Click on button cartFavoritesAction (addToCart2)
Step 6: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductClawHammer)
Step 7: Click on button cartFavoritesAction (addToFavorites)
Step 8: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductClawHammerMoreInfo)
Step 9: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductThorHammerMoreInfo)
Step 10: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductSledgehammerMoreInfo)
Step 11: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductClawHammerFiberglass)
Step 12: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductCourtHammer)
Step 13: Click on link viewProductDetails (viewProductCourtHammer)
Step 14: Click on link navigateCategories
Step 15: Click on link navigateOther -> Navigate to page 'other category#*/*'
Step 16: Click on link viewProductSafetyGoggles -> Navigate to page ''
Step 17: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
